name: After Dreams
description: After Dreams is a story-rich exploration game based on real life experiences and events. The main focus of the story is to answer the basic human question that has pervaded our collective consciousness since sentience: What happens when we die?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: lol
